com.parkingtycoon.models

Class FloorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.models.BaseModel
      • com.parkingtycoon.models.FloorModel

  • public class FloorModel
extends BaseModel
    This Class is responsible for storing all data of a floor. Such as all tiles, parked cars, reservations, buildings and more.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FloorModel.FloorType
      A floor consists of a lot of tiles.
